COMPANY.TITLE: Company
COMPANY.DESCRIPTION: MBO Trinity GmbH is a leading provider of high-precision engineering services and innovative solutions for the construction of cleanrooms, test benches, plant integration and special plant construction.

PRODUCTS.TITLE: Products
PRODUCTS.DESCRIPTION: Coming from the semiconductor industry, with a strong focus on cutting-edge technology and innovation, our products and services fulfill forward-looking solutions that meet the highest standards of precision, reliability and efficiency.

CAREER.TITLE: Career
CAREER.PARA1: Become part of our team! We are constantly looking for talented and motivated employees who want to shape the future together with us.
CAREER.PARA2: At MBO Trinity, you can expect exciting projects, an innovative environment and diverse development opportunities.

QR_SECTION.STEP3: Follow the menu on your phone

ANLAGENINTEGRATION.PARA1: MBO Trinity GmbH plans and constructs cleanrooms in compliance with ISO 14644-1 cleanroom standards.
ANLAGENINTEGRATION.PARA2: We integrate cleanrooms into existing buildings or plan and construct new cleanroom systems. We realize highly complex high-tech cleanroom systems, e.g., with full-surface laminar flow with a negative-pressure plenum, CG distributors, raised floors and return air ducts with an integrated mu-metal chamber, etc. Our services cover complete cleanroom outfitting, e.g., media supply, machine foundations, exhaust systems, vibration isolation systems, electrical systems, fire protection, explosion protection, gas warning systems, crane systems, air conditioning and more. Comprehensive planning is at the center of every project. For detailed planning we use flow visualization software, FEM software, and BIM systems for 3D planning.
ANLAGENINTEGRATION.PARA3:
Construction is carried out depending on requirements by our qualified installers or our subcontractors.
Compliance with safety and operating standards for personnel and machines
Coordination, site inspection, PPE, workplace preparation
Compliance with budget and installation specifications as well as schedules
Validation of functionality through all required tests and acceptance (FAT)
Handover of systems, documentation and training
Ensuring flawless function and high-quality execution
ANLAGENINTEGRATION.SPECS:
Specifications our cleanrooms achieve include:
Standard for main body installation area: ISO 3 (14644-1)
Magnetic field fluctuation tolerances: \(AC \le 0.03\,\mu\text{T}\), \(DC < 0.03\,\mu\text{T}\)
Temperature stability of ambient air: \(\pm 20\,\text{mK}\)
Pressure stability: \(\pm 1\,\text{Pa}\)
Humidity stability: \(\pm 0.2\,\%\)
Laminar flow downwarded
Floor vibration criteria \(\le \mathrm{VC{-}E}\)

PRAEZISIONSKLIMAGERAET.PARA1: MBO Trinity GmbH builds and integrates high-precision, highly complex solutions for climate control in process environments, as well as in-house developed precision climate device skids such as the A²HTC.
PRAEZISIONSKLIMAGERAET.PARA2:
Cleanrooms
Laboratories
Test benches, test stands, climate chambers
Separated process environments
Protected areas with laminar flow or turbulent mixed flow
PRAEZISIONSKLIMAGERAET.SPECS:
Designed for maximum supply reliability and tight specifications, e.g.:
Temperature: \(21\,^{\circ}\mathrm{C}\) - \(23\,^{\circ}\mathrm{C}\); stability \(\pm 0.02\,\mathrm{K}\)
Relative humidity: \(35\,\%\) - \(50\,\%\); stability \(\pm 1\,\%\)
Pressure: stability \(\pm 1\,\mathrm{Pa}\)

PRAEZISIONSTERMOSTAT.PARA1_POST: builds and integrates high-precision liquid-to-liquid process thermostats and cooling systems for highly sensitive equipment.
PRAEZISIONSTERMOSTAT.PARA3: The systems serve as process cooling for equipment with the highest demands on temperature stability, controllable flow rates and stable pressure. Planning and construction of custom systems tailored to your requirements.
PRAEZISIONSTERMOSTAT.SPECS: Constant supply temperature with stability of \(\pm 0.2\,\mathrm{K}\).

PRAEZISIONSTERMOSTAT.PARA1: MBO Trinity GmbH builds and integrates high-precision liquid-to-liquid process thermostats and cooling systems for cooling highly sensitive equipment such as MBMW tools, photomask development systems, sputtering tools, scanning electron microscopes, test benches, and more.
PRAEZISIONSTERMOSTAT.PARA2: The cooling systems and process thermostats are designed for maximum supply reliability and for meeting the strictest specifications.
PRAEZISIONSTERMOSTAT.PARA3: The liquid-to-liquid process thermostats and cooling systems serve as process cooling for equipment with the highest demands on temperature stability, controllable flow rates and stable pressure.
PRAEZISIONSTERMOSTAT.PARA4: The cooling systems are designed to maintain a constant supply temperature with stability of ± 0.2 K.
PRAEZISIONSTERMOSTAT.PARA5: Planning and construction of custom liquid-to-liquid process thermostats and cooling systems tailored to your requirements.

ANLAGENINTEGRATION.PARA1: MBO Trinity GmbH plans and integrates highly sensitive equipment such as MBMW tools, photomask development systems, sputtering tools, scanning electron microscopes, test benches, and climate chambers in cleanrooms and gray rooms.
ANLAGENINTEGRATION.PARA2: As a rule, we act as general contractor for project implementation and coordinate the entire project execution.
ANLAGENINTEGRATION.PARA3: We are accustomed to integrating highly complex equipment into existing cleanroom environments during ongoing production. Even foundation work with demolition, excavation and concreting has been carried out multiple times in existing cleanroom environments while production continued.
ANLAGENINTEGRATION.PARA4: The services of MBO Trinity GmbH cover the entire project cycle:
ANLAGENINTEGRATION.LIST_ITEM1: We carry out layout and detailed planning for plant integration, including media and energy supply as well as sub-components
ANLAGENINTEGRATION.LIST_ITEM2: Plan and adapt existing process environments or build new process environments for accommodating the system and meeting specifications
ANLAGENINTEGRATION.LIST_ITEM3: We coordinate installation by the equipment supplier or subcontractors or perform it ourselves
ANLAGENINTEGRATION.LIST_ITEM4: Support FAT with the equipment supplier or perform it ourselves and create the project documentation
ANLAGENINTEGRATION.LIST_ITEM5: We coordinate installation by the equipment supplier or subcontractors or perform it ourselves
ANLAGENINTEGRATION.LIST_ITEM6: We coordinate installation by the equipment supplier or subcontractors or perform it ourselves
ANLAGENINTEGRATION.LIST_ITEM7: Support FAT with the equipment supplier or perform it ourselves and create the project documentation
ANLAGENINTEGRATION.LIST_TEXT: We ensure that the strictest specifications are met and that the implementation of your system is carried out at the highest quality level.
ANLAGENINTEGRATION.OUTRO: We ensure that the strictest specifications are met and that the implementation of your system is carried out at the highest quality level.

REINRAUMLOESUNG.PARA1: MBO Trinity GmbH plans and builds cleanrooms in compliance with ISO 14644-1 cleanroom standards.
REINRAUMLOESUNG.PARA2: We integrate cleanrooms into existing buildings or plan and build new cleanroom systems.
REINRAUMLOESUNG.PARA3: We realize highly complex high-tech cleanroom systems, e.g., full-surface laminar flow with negative-pressure plenum, CG distributors, raised floors and return air ducts with integrated mu-metal chamber, etc.
REINRAUMLOESUNG.PARA4: Our services also include complete cleanroom outfitting such as media supply, machine foundations, exhaust systems, vibration isolation systems, electrical systems, fire protection, explosion protection measures, gas warning systems, crane systems, air conditioning, etc.
REINRAUMLOESUNG.PARA5: Comprehensive planning is a key focus in all projects. For detailed planning we use flow visualization software, FEM software and BIM systems for 3D planning.
REINRAUMLOESUNG.PARA6: Construction is carried out as required by our qualified installers or our subcontractors.

REINRAUMLOESUNG.SPECS_INTRO: Specifications our cleanrooms are required to meet include, for example:
REINRAUMLOESUNG.SPECS_ITEM1: Standard for main body installation area: ISO 3 (14644-1)
REINRAUMLOESUNG.SPECS_ITEM2: Magnetic field fluctuation tolerances: AC ≤ 0.03 µT, DC < 0.03 µT
REINRAUMLOESUNG.SPECS_ITEM3: Temperature stability of ambient air: ±20 mK

A2_HTC.INTRO_PARA: The A²HTC precision air conditioning unit is an air-to-air process thermostat for precise control of process environments with the highest requirements for temperature, relative humidity and pressure integrity. The A²HTC precision air conditioning unit can remove heat loads of up to 30 kW from the process environment.
A2_HTC.MODES_INTRO: The A²HTC precision air conditioning unit ensures either:
A2_HTC.MODE1: constant process conditions (Mode 1) through precise control of temperature, humidity and pressure or
A2_HTC.APP2: Test benches / test facilities / climatic chambers / bioreactors
A2_HTC.APP4: Air conditioning of cleanrooms up to a room volume of 90 m³

PERFORMANCE.TITLE: P E R F O R M A N C E  D A T A
PERFORMANCE.MODE1_LABEL: Mode 1: Stable temperature and relative humidity
PERFORMANCE.MODE2_LABEL: Mode 2: Temperature and humidity ramping (up & down)

CT_2_0.INTRO: The Cooling Tower CT 2.0 as a liquid-to-liquid process thermostat serves as process cooling for systems with the highest demands on temperature stability, defined volume flow, stable pressure and supply security with a dissipated heat quantity of up to 800 kW.
CT_2_0.MODES_INTRO: The Cooling Tower CT 2.0 can be operated with 2 operating modes:
CT_2_0.MODE1: Mode 1: Constant flow temperature with a temperature stability of ± 0.2 K
CT_2_0.MODE2: Mode 2: Up- & Downramping of flow temperature
CT_2_0.UTILITIES_PARA1: Up to 4 utilities can be connected to the Cooling Tower CT 2.0.
CT_2_0.UTILITIES_PARA2: The Cooling Tower CT 2.0 supplies all utilities with the same flow temperature and dissipates heat loads via the heat exchanger to the building cooling supply.
CT_2_0.UTILITIES_PARA3: The volume flow can be regulated separately for each utility, whereby the system pressure for all utilities is kept constant at the desired pressure point.

COMPANY_PAGE.INTRO_PARA1: MBO Trinity GmbH is a leading provider of high-precision engineering services and innovative solutions for the construction of cleanrooms, test benches, plant integration and special plant construction.
COMPANY_PAGE.INTRO_PARA2: Coming from the semiconductor industry, with a strong focus on cutting-edge technology and innovation, we develop forward-looking solutions that meet the highest standards of precision, reliability and efficiency.
COMPANY_PAGE.INTRO_PARA3: Our business areas include Project Management, Engineering, Measurement, Control and Regulation Technology, Software Development as well as Manufacturing and Assembly.
COMPANY_PAGE.INTRO_PARA4: We provide our services either directly at the customer's site or on 600 m² of production space at our location in Brunn am Gebirge.

TIMELINE_TEXT.PARA1: In our function as an executing company or as a general contractor, we take full responsibility for compliance with safety and quality standards as well as for targeted and on-time project implementation in the most complex process environments.
TIMELINE_TEXT.PARA2: Thanks to our extensive expertise and innovation, we support international corporations and technology leaders in implementing projects that set new standards in the industry.
TIMELINE_TEXT.PARA3: One of MBO's core competencies includes meeting the strictest specifications, such as temperature stability ±2 mK, pressure ±1 Pa, relative humidity ±0.2%, magnetic field AC ≤ 0.03 µT, DC < 0.03 µT, etc.
TIMELINE_TEXT.PARA4: MBO constructs process environments such as cleanrooms, test, measurement and climate chambers with the necessary systems and aggregates ensuring that strict specifications are met and work processes can be carried out safely and efficiently.
TIMELINE_TEXT.PARA5: MBO integrates capital-intensive systems worth double-digit millions of euros, such as MBMW tools, photomask development systems, scanning electron microscopes, test benches, climate chambers, clusters, etc., in process environments. MBO's services encompass the full project cycle.

TIMELINE_EVENTS.2024:
Company reorganization
Founding of MBO Trinity GmbH
Founding of MBO Engineering GmbH

Relocation of Engineering Office HALLEIN
to PUCH near HALLEIN
TIMELINE_EVENTS.2021:
Relocation of production site Traiskirchen
to Brunn am Gebirge;
Expansion of production area to 600 m²
TIMELINE_EVENTS.2019:
Opening of production site Traiskirchen;
Start of assembly for industrial plants

HOME_NEW.PARA1: MBO plans and constructs process environments such as cleanrooms, test, measurement and climate chambers with the necessary systems and aggregates to ensure that the strictest specifications are met and that work processes in these process environments can be carried out safely and efficiently.
HOME_NEW.PARA2: MBO integrates capital-intensive systems worth double-digit millions of euros, such as MBMW tools, photomask development systems, scanning electron microscopes, test benches, climate chambers, clusters, etc., in process environments. MBO's services encompass the full project cycle.
